text: Tanishk-Vayu is a duo of Indian composer Tanishk Bagchi and lyricist Vayu Shrivastav, who also act as a composer duo. They together composed for films like Tanu Weds Manu Returns(2015), Bareilly Ki Barfi (2017), Tumhari Sulu(2017),Tanish-Vayu song 'Manva Likes to Fly' Shubh Mangal Saavdhan(2017), Munna Michael(2017), Gold(2018), Mitron(2018), Dil Juunglee(2018), Badhaai Ho(2018), Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan(2020)etc.It's Pritam's year, but Tanishk-Vayu is the one to watch out for The duo also composed the Pepsi Anthem of 2020 named Swag Se Solo. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#cfc;
